text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Market Size and Growth Trends
The Indian Agri-Fin Tech market is growing at a CAGR of 18-20%, with Tamil Nadu being a key region due to high agricultural productivity and digital penetration. The farm-to-home D2C market is witnessing rapid adoption, driven by increasing consumer demand for organic and fresh produce. Digital payment adoption among farmers is rising, enabling seamless transactions and financial services.
